description:
Having acquired all seven Namekian Dragon Balls, Krillin and Gohan are ready to summon the dragon and make their wish.  There’s just one problem: they don’t know the password!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Diga o código secreto das Esferas do Dragão!
Nanatsu no Tama o Soroeshimono yo... Saa Aikotoba o Ie!
รวบรวมดราก้อนบอลครบ มาอัญเชิญเทพมังกรกัน!
七ッの玉を揃えし者よ... さあ合言葉を言え!
